Package simulation

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Simulator
  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Main simulation engine for the pathfinder problem.

      Simulator​(Grid grid, int initialPopulation, int maxPopulation, double comfortSensitivity, double deathMean, double moveMean, double reproductionMean, double simulationTime)
      Creates a new simulator with the given parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator​(Grid grid,
                 int initialPopulation,
                 int maxPopulation,
                 double comfortSensitivity,
                 double deathMean,
                 double moveMean,
                 double reproductionMean,
                 double simulationTime)
        Creates a new simulator with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        grid - The grid
        initialPopulation - The initial population size (ν)
        maxPopulation - The maximum population size (νmax)
        comfortSensitivity - The comfort sensitivity parameter (k)
        deathMean - The mean value for the death event (μ)
        moveMean - The mean value for the move event (δ)
        reproductionMean - The mean value for the reproduction event (ρ)
        simulationTime - The final time of the simulation (τ)

    • Method Detail

      • simulate

        public Individual simulate()
        Runs the simulation until the final time or until there are no more events.
        Returns:
        The best individual found during the simulation
